token_info.name: n-Cave
token_info.description: n-Cave is a data-driven meditative space. It is an attempt to create an escalating visual memory that monumentalizes continuous events. Based on the real data on victims of the virus, n-Cave is an endlessly growing structure that can be visited by any network user. While inside, visitors can empathise with the events that are still happening, immersing themselves in an audio-visual meditation. When the data update will stop n-Cave will enter its death phaseâ€”it will freeze, keeping a snapshot of its structure as both a virtual space and a physical monument.
